title: 2019 – Extending the horizons: A year of many hits and a few misses
excerpt: Reflecting back at the year gone by, it has been another eventful year in both professional as well as personal life where I looked to extend my horizons through some firsts in life, overcoming limiting beliefs

title: How to A’s your limiting beliefs?
excerpt: I can’t speak in a public forum, I am not as good as my colleague, I am not a creative person, I can’t run a Marathon, or I am too old to shift my career
